name: Mummy I Caught Santa
description:
Use left, right arrows to run,  up, down arrows to climb, and space bar to jump. Catch Santa and prove to your momma that he's real. But don't let him see you!

Credits:

Heart GUI

https://donhellsing.itch.io

Winters Wish- David Renda
